mapper.insert: insert into CMember( m_userStat, m_email, m_userId, m_userPw, m_hspNm, m_name, m_phone, m_tel, m_zipCd, m_addr, m_addr_detail) values( #{m_userStat}, #{m_email}, #{m_userId}, #{m_userPw}, #{m_hspNm}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_tel}, #{m_zipCd}, #{m_addr}, #{m_addr_detail} )

insert into Staff( m_userStat, m_email, m_userId, m_userPw, m_name, m_phone, m_tel, m_zipCd, m_addr, m_addr_detail) values( #{m_userStat}, #{m_email}, #{m_userId}, #{m_userPw}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_tel}, #{m_zipCd}, #{m_addr}, #{m_addr_detail} )
mapper.select: select * from CMember where m_tel=#{m_tel} and m_name=#{m_name}
mapper.update: update CMember set del='y' where m_userId=#{m_userId}
update CMember set del='Y' where m_userId=#{m_userId}
mapper.select: select * from(select b.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn from CMember b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp order by m_hspNm desc) as boardlist where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from(select b.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn from CMember b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp order by amount desc) as boardlist where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from(select b.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn from Staff b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp order by m_name desc) as boardlist where m_userStat = '출하직원';
mapper.update: update CMember set amount=#{amount} where m_email=#{m_email}
update CMember set amount=#{amount} where m_email=#{m_email}
